function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-glass", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then abyss(i-1,line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0}) fill_floor("fl-leaves", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="y" then set_actor("ac-whiteball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=1}) fill_floor("fl-leaves", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c=="W" then set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, WEST), "name", "laser") elseif c=="x" then fill_floor("fl-leaves", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="s" then set_stone("st-stoneimpulse",i-1,line) elseif c=="S" then set_stone( "st-stoneimpulse-hollow", i-1,line) elseif c == "b" then yy1( "black", i-1, line) elseif c == "w" then yy1( "white", i-1, line) elseif c=="g" then set_stone("st-grate1",i-1,line) end end end
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s4", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) end
